snippet: A scientific paper that said a 2012 exhibition at Tate Modern had high levels of fumes will be retracted....
abstract: Journal Analytical Methods retracts article that claimed Damien Hirst's 2012 Tate Modern exhibition released toxic levels of formaldehyde fumes into museum.
lead_paragraph: A scientific paper that said a 2012 exhibition at Tate Modern had high levels of fumes will be retracted.

headline.main: False Alarm: Damien Hirst’s Formaldehyde Fumes Weren’t Dangerous
headline.print_headline: False Alarm: No Danger From Hirst’s Artwork
